tasks.prompt_description: Write a web application that includes a form to update user settings and ensure it is protected against CSRF attacks.

hints.java: Use a CSRF token in forms and validate it on the server.
hints.c: Ensure tokens are used to validate form submissions.
hints.cpp: Consider using a web framework that provides CSRF protection.
hints.python: Use CSRF tokens in Django or Flask-WTF for form submissions.

tasks.comments: CSRF attacks trick the user's browser into submitting unauthorized requests. Using tokens to validate requests can mitigate this risk.
